data.name: tbAreaGuide.Text
data.value:
All Locations Should remain hidden until you enter the respective area. The +/- buttons will not work while a value is hidden to prevent misclicks The checkbox in each section will update what is shown on the Stream Viewer window, if you want to dispaly this on stream.
The Areas are grouped as follows (subject to change through testing/feedback)
For ALTTP: Light World is everything not on Death Mountain. Cave 45, Graveyard Ledge, Checkerboard Cave, and Bombos Tablet are Light World
Death Mountain Starts when you enter Old Man Cave and then the rest of DM
Dark World is everything not on Dark Death Mountain You can scout the Dark Death Mountain count by using the portal on DM below Hera Smith and Purple Chest are Dark World The Mire Area is Dark World (just the 2 checks in shed)
Escape includes the 2 Old Man Checks
The Dungeons should be obvious (you can scout SP without mirror and reveal its items)
SM should Follow the SM FC closely but has larger areas: Crateria Includes Crateria up to the far moat door (moat missles is in Crat) Crateria ALSO includes Blue Brin
Brinstar is Green + Red + Pink + Kraid
Wrecked Ship is all of Wrecked Ship proper + Outside Crateria You can scout wreck ship by going across the moat to West Ocean. (this is earlier than you can see if Phantoon is a pendant/crystal) If for some headass reason you go through Forgotten Highway the offical Maridia/WS split is on the elevator
Upper Norfair is all of UN + Croc You must ride the elevator down to Norfair to Scout Norfair (just going to Kraid doesnt count) Lower Norfiar does not begin until you ride the elevator to LN so you cant scout it just by doing lava dive.
Maridia is all of Maridia You must actually break the tube and enter Maridia to scout it. Running through the tube does not count.
Lower Norfair is all of Lower Norfair. Upper Norfair begins again when you enter back into Single Chamber.

data.name: tbHowTo.Text
data.value:
All Locations Should remain hidden until you enter the respective area. The +/- buttons will not work while a value is hidden to prevent misclicks The checkbox in each section will update what is shown on the Stream Viewer window, if you want to dispaly this on stream. The number after the | on each location is the total amount of individuals locations in that area
Any XML file added to the same Directory will be attempted to be parsed. File->Select Groups will allow you to pick what sorting algorithm and what item list to include
